availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah F. Mitchusson (Caldwell County, Ky, farm laborer, pvt 1st Ky Cav (csa))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Elijah F. Mitchusson and Mildred J. Mitchusson. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farm laborer in Caldwell County in 1860. Served in the 1st Regiment Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.) as a private.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 366A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 790.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 2.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0002.
